product.description: LetzteChance.org LC2FFExt Firefox Extension 2022 - The official Firefox Extension of LetzteChance.org.

eaten.message: LetzteChance.org LC2FFExt eats this page.
eaten.message2: LetzteChance.org LC2FFExt eats this page.<input type="button" value="Start" id="lc-function-notify" onclick="window.messenger.showNotify(JSON.stringify('document'));alert('DONE'+JSON.stringify('document'));"/><input type="button" value="Call object" id="lc-object-notify" onclick="window.showNotify(document);alert('DONE');"/><script>const button1 = document.querySelector("#lc-function-notify");button1.addEventListener("click", () => {  window.notify("Message from the page script!");});const button2 = document.querySelector("#lc-object-notify");button2.addEventListener("click", () => {  window.messenger.notify(document);});</script>
